mapper.select: select A.* from(select row_number() over(order by no desc) rnum, no, title, station_name, member_id, posted_time, hits from BURN_BOARD) A where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
mapper.insert:
select burn_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into burn_board(no, title, posted_time, content, station_name, member_id, hits) values(#{no},#{title}, sysdate, #{content}, #{stationName}, #{memberId}, #{hits})
mapper.update: update burn_board set hits=hits+1 where no = #{value}
mapper.select: select count(*) from burn_board where station_name = #{value}
